attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned are regular riders in castle point. We wish to complain about the condition of the bridle ways in our area particularly around Woodside park, the lakes, Keswick road and Coniston Road. It is impossible to pass another rider as some are totally overgrown and impassable. Riders have sustained injuries and have complained to you before no avail. We the undersigned request that Castle point rectify this problem.
